info.title: EduAgent API
info.description: EduAgent API with Azure Entra Authentication

get.description: List all messages in a chat with sources

schema.title: Response List Chat Messages V1 Chats  Chat Id  Messages Get

post.summary: Send a streaming message to a chat
post.description: Send a message to a chat with streaming response
Upload and process a document for the project

get.description: List all documents for a project

post.description: Search documents within a project using semantic search

get.description: Stream document content for preview in browser

post.description: Create a new flashcard group for a project, optionally with generated flashcards

get.description: List all flashcard groups for a project
Get a specific flashcard group by ID

delete.description: Delete a flashcard group and all its flashcards

get.description: List all flashcards in a group

post.description: Create a new quiz for a project, optionally with generated questions

get.description: List all quizzes for a project
Get a specific quiz by ID

delete.description: Delete a quiz and all its questions

get.description: List all questions in a quiz

post.description: Create a new study attempt record for a flashcard or quiz question

get.description: List study attempt records for the current user, optionally filtered by project

post.description: Create multiple study attempt records in a single batch operation

get.description: Simple health check that doesn't require database
